sentences.sContent: The official report into the cause of the fire was labeled a whitewash.
sentences.sCn: 官方的火灾原因报告被说成是对真相的隐瞒。

synos.tran: 粉饰；[涂料]白色涂料；[建]石灰水

trans.tranOther: a report or examination of events that hides the true facts about something so that the person who is responsible will not be punished
to hide the true facts about a serious accident or illegal action
